property.name: http.agent.name
property.description:
HTTP 'User-Agent' request header. MUST NOT be empty - please set this to a single word uniquely related to your organization.
NOTE: You should also check other related properties:
http.robots.agents http.agent.description http.agent.url http.agent.email http.agent.version
and set their values appropriately.

property.name: db.ignore.external.links
property.description: If true, outlinks leading from a page to external hosts or domain will be ignored. This is an effective way to limit the crawl to include only initially injected hosts or domains, without creating complex URLFilters. See 'db.ignore.external.links.mode'.

property.name: elastic.host
property.description: The hostname to send documents to using TransportClient. Either host and port must be defined or cluster.

property.name: elastic.port
property.description: The port to connect to using TransportClient.

property.name: elastic.cluster
property.description: The cluster name to discover. Either host and port must be defined.

property.name: elastic.index
property.description: The name of the elasticsearch index. Will normally be autocreated if it doesn't exist.
